title: Freelance - Project Supervisor
description: Overseeing of ongoing projects. Ensure that projects are running as intended. Coordinating and supervision of project.

title: Part Time - Customer Service
description: Handling of customer's drop off and pick up of laundry. Entrusted to hold the keys to the shop and manage the shop alone. Developing a POS system for the shop along with collegues.

title: Part Time - Retail Assistant
description: Retail staff at multiple FOSSIL outlets. Trusted to use their POS system and manage cash. Was relied on as if i was a full timer.

title: Part Time - Customer Service
description: Issuing of gift vouchers at Phillips Redemption Counter. Tasked to manage customers in a polite and friendly manner. Trusted to handle cash vouchers and data entry

title: Internship - Product Designer
description: Entrusted to redesign the company website. Created product manuals and built products for clients. Tasked to embark on a new design project and had to learn ‘Grasshopper’ from scratch
